item.title: Let's not over-hype rust.

item.title: hack the planet | finding focus
item.description: Hey y’all, Maybe it is the poor Internet connection in Ireland, but I feel disconnected. Watching a site load brings me back to when you had to find offline tasks while waiting. Breaking up a hyperconnected workflow has helped immensely with building focus. I am finishing up an annual cyber security competition I will run in Maryland soon. I’ll share when I am done; it is enjoyable to play 😊 After I clear that off my plate, my focus will fall on building a course on service design patterns.

item.description: You can’t be a good manager or executive, in any industry, if you operate in constant denial of the facts on the ground.
